definitions: throughout the entire time that something lasts or continues
at some unspecified point within a period of time
examples: She remained silent during the entire meeting
The museum is closed during the winter months
Something strange happened during the night
He called several times during the afternoon

definitions: at a time earlier than something else happens or exists
in a position in front of someone or something else
in the presence of someone, especially someone important or official
examples: Brush your teeth before going to bed
She arrived before the meeting started
He stood before the large wooden door
The path stretches before us for miles
She appeared before the judge yesterday
He had to testify before the committee

definitions: in a position lower than or beneath something else
less than a particular number, amount, or age
controlled, governed, or directed by someone or something
experiencing particular conditions, circumstances, or treatment
examples: The cat is hiding under the table
She found her keys under the newspaper
Children under five travel free
The temperature dropped under zero degrees
The project is under new management
This area falls under federal jurisdiction
The bridge is under construction
He's been under a lot of stress lately

definitions: on all sides of or encircling something or someone
in various places within a particular area or location
approximately or roughly a particular number, time, or amount
moving in a circular direction or following a curved path
examples: They sat around the campfire
She wore a scarf around her neck
There are shops around the neighborhood
Papers were scattered around the room
The meeting starts around three o'clock
It costs around fifty dollars
The Earth revolves around the sun
They walked around the lake

definitions: surrounded by or in the middle of a group of people or things
shared between or divided among members of a group
being one member or example of a larger group or set
examples: She felt comfortable among her friends
The house stands among tall pine trees
Divide the candy among the children
The work was distributed among team members
This ranks among the best restaurants
He is among the world's greatest athletes

definitions: away from or no longer touching a surface or position
not operating, functioning, or connected; switched to inactive state
removed, separated, or detached from something it was part of
at a specified distance away from a place or position
examples: The book fell off the shelf
Please take your feet off the table
Turn the lights off before leaving
The computer has been off all day
Cut off the damaged branches
She took the day off from work
The island is ten miles off the coast
The wedding is still months off

definitions: containing something as part of a whole or group
with the addition or inclusion of something or someone mentioned
examples: Everyone attended, including the manager
The price is fifty dollars, including tax
Many countries, including France and Germany, signed
All students, including freshmen, must register

definitions: of the particular kind or character that has been mentioned
to such a great degree or extent; so very much
examples: I've never seen such beautiful flowers
Such behavior will not be tolerated
It was such a wonderful surprise
She speaks with such confidence and grace

definitions: inside the boundaries, limits, or area of something
not going beyond or exceeding a particular limit or amount
before a specified period of time has passed; in less than
examples: The keys are within the drawer
Stay within the marked boundaries
Keep expenses within the budget
The temperature stayed within normal range
Please respond within three days
The package will arrive within a week

definitions: from one side to the other side of something
on the opposite side of a space, area, or line
in every part of a place, group, or area; throughout
examples: She walked across the bridge slowly
Draw a line across the page
The store is across the street
They live across the river from us
The news spread across the country
Support increased across all age groups
